title: [Bug] Blitz hook and ezreals E
body:
Ok when is was playing blitz as we all do I used my Q and hooked ezreal. But on contact ezreal pressed E which made him teleport away from the hook even when it had made contact already.

Idk if this is a bug or its just a skill thing. I hope u can fix it rito plz

replies.body: Coming from a Ez mainer, it's a skill thing. Sometimes it doesn't work, sometimes it does. You have to have great timing.
